sqlMap.select: select proownerid from pro_datapreinfo where id in ( select projectId from pro_assignRelate where governmentAssignId=#id#) group by proownerid
select id,audittype from pro_datapreinfo where id in( select projectId from pro_assignRelate where governmentAssignId=#id#)
select proownerid,projectName from pro_datapreinfo where id in(select projectId from pro_assignRelate where governmentAssignId=#governmentAssignId#)
